sen.j: 旧鼠（きゅうそ）は、変化して何百年・何千年を生きているという日本のネズミの妖怪。
sen.e: Kyuso is a specter in Japan which has the form of a mouse and is said to have lived for hundreds and thousands of years by undergoing transformation.
